channel.title: Zach Gershkoff's nice website

item.title: About
item.description: Zach Gershkoff holds a PhD in mathematics from Louisiana State University. He is a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer from South Africa and he enjoys working with technology and making things.
item.content:
Zach Gershkoff holds a PhD in mathematics from Louisiana State University.

He is a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer from South Africa and he enjoys working with technology and making things.
